events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The case has been reviewed and labelled under the 'Refund' category based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to follow up with the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund and I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process this as quickly as possible?
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and does not function as advertised, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We can issue a full refund once you return the damaged item. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for providing the return shipping label. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue.
The refund has been processed successfully after the return was received. You should see the amount credited back to your account soon.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was successful and there are no further concerns, we have now closed your support case. Thank you!
